body.name: LEGO Sonic The Hedgehog Tails’ Workshop and Tornado Plane 76991 Building Toy Set, Airplane Toy with 4 Sonic Figures and Accessories for Creative Role Play, Gift for 6 Year Olds who Love Gaming
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs 48 mins
features: Fun for young Sonic fans – Inspire kids to build a course for Sonic the Hedgehog with this LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog Tails’ Workshop and Tornado Plane (76991) toy playset for kids aged 6 and up
Buildable plane – Kids can build the Tornado plane and workshop then use the plane to collect the Rings, defeat the Badnik and rescue Sonic’s animal friend
4 Sonic figures and accessories – This Sonic airplane toy playset comes with characters Sonic, Tails, a Clucky, Buzz Bomber and lots of toy accessories for role play

2 ways to play – After sending the heroes through the course, kids can enjoy a change of pace as they create their own stories for Sonic and Tails, caring for the Clucky or hanging out in the workshop
A gift for Sonic fans and gamers – This LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog building toy set makes a fun holiday, any-day or birthday gift for 6 year olds who love gaming merchandise and imaginative play
body.description: Kids ages 6 and up create thrilling escapades with this LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog Tails’ Workshop and Tornado Plane (76991) building toy set. Inspired by their favorite Sonic adventures and characters, kids can reimagine exciting quests as they build the course. They can have fun using the Tornado plane to collect the Rings and take out the flying Badnik Buzz Bomber to release the captured Clucky. This Sonic airplane toy contains 4 Sonic figures and is packed with fast action play but that’s not all – it’s also designed to encourage creative storytelling. After defeating the Badnik, kids can act out the story as Sonic and Tails conduct research or make repairs in the fully equipped workshop before relaxing with the Clucky. Fast action fun meets creative play with LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog playsets. Fans of the Blue Blur will love creating scenes inspired by favorite Sonic adventures, making for a fun gift for 6 year olds who love gaming. When it’s time for a change of pace, kids can enjoy imaginative play caring for Sonic’s animal friends. Contains 376 pieces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Build and play with Sonic and Tails Fast action play meets creative fun in this LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog Tails’ Workshop and Tornado Plane toy building set.
Build the Tornado Plane and save the day Kids can build the plane and workshop then use the plane to collect the Rings, defeat the Badnik and save the animal friend.

LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog Tails’ Workshop and Tornado Plane Build the course Kids can use the Rings to make a course for Sonic and Tails. Defeat the Badnik Use the plane to knock over the Rings and defeat the Badnik. Explore Tails’ workshop Kids can role-play with the characters in the workshop.
Enter a digital world of building Builders can zoom in, rotate sets in 3D and track progress using the fun, intuitive LEGO Builder app.
A gift for Sonic fans and gamers This set comes with 4 characters and accessories and makes a fun gift for kids who love Sonic and his friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of small references sprinkled throughout and strong, simple construction - a very fun, easy set
reviews.reviewText: Really excited to see Sonic return to LEGO form with this new line of sets, especially his friends - I know a lot of people, myself included, have been wanting minifig Tails for a long time! The fox's workshop has a lot of detail for the size, with two work benches for all your (or your kid's) engineering needs, or simply to take care of the included Clucky (plus a small potted plant that Sonic X fans might recognize) One of the seven Chaos Emeralds, the yellow one, sits on the other bench for our heroes to study with the Miles Electric.Sonic's famous Tornado is also very well built for the scale. The biplane feels extremely sturdy and is pleasant to hold, and you can, of course, place Sonic and Tails in the cockpit or on the upper wing, just like in the games and movie.The smaller parts add to the experience, too: the Buzz Bomber, although somewhat flat, still performs its job as a Badnik well enough. A recliner and toolbox are also included, and there's even a few mint candies for Tails to enjoy - yet another reference for more well-versed fans.All in all, this set is really enjoyable to play with or display. Definitely a must-buy for any LEGO Sonic fans!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good set
reviews.reviewText: This set is easy to build. The size is a little small but still really good. Love how the plane looks and the quality of the set. This is a really good set for sonic fans.

reviews.reviewerName: Beautiful item! Boy is it heavy. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and son loved it
reviews.reviewText: My 11 year old loves to build Legos and is a fan of Sonic the Hedgehog. He enjoyed building this one. The colors and pieces were really good. They aren't faded or scratched. You can play with it without worrying about it breaking easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very east to put together!
reviews.reviewText: My son and I love working on Legos. He is 6! This was easy to put together and he almost wouldn't let me help! He plays with this one for hours.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality toy for any six-year-old
reviews.reviewText: Great toy for any 6 year old. I bought this for my grandson and he plays with it for hours. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gotta Go Fast
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 9 year old. He put it together at Sonic speed. It's an easy build and they played with it for hours after. Would purchase again.
